body: I will never trust this author again no matter how many times he write wholesome manga.

Small review for the people who don't like NTR:

Looking at the preview, this doesn't seem that bad asides from one of the final pages. The monster girl doesn't seem that interested in the boy, who's also a shota. Could be unappealing to some people. Doujin with non-virgin women can be pretty cute, but this isn't it. If that wasn't enough, the monster girl pulls out her phone and shows him her ex fucking her.
Damn, I normally hate vanilla but I was enjoying this as a vanilla title until I got to the last part.
